        <api_name>global.AttachmentAuditTrailHelper</api_name>

        <description/>
        <name>AttachmentAuditTrailHelper</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var AttachmentAuditTrailHelper = Class.create();
AttachmentAuditTrailHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function (attachmentRecord) {
        this._attachmentRecord = attachmentRecord;
        this.parentUpdated = false;
    },

    _isValidAttachment: function () {
        var ar = this._attachmentRecord;
        if (gs.nil(ar) || !ar.isValid())
            return false;
        if (!ar.isValidField('table_name') || !ar.isValidField('table_sys_id'))
            return false;
        var op = ar.operation();
        if (op != 'insert' && op != 'update' && op != 'delete')
            return false;

        return true;
    },

    recordUpdateOnParent: function () {
        if (!this._isValidAttachment())
            return;

        var ar = this._attachmentRecord;
        // make sure table is filled in
        if (!ar.table_name)
            return;

        // check to make sure table exists
        var gr = new GlideRecord(ar.table_name);
        if (!gr.isValid())
            return;

        // Make sure table is audited
        if (!new GlideAuditor(ar.table_name, null).auditTable())
            return;

        // Make sure table doesn't have synch_attachments,
        // in which case this will create two update versions
        if (gr.getED().getBooleanAttribute('synch_attachments'))
            return;

        if (gr.get(ar.table_sys_id)) {
            gr.setForceUpdate(true);
            gr.setWorkflow(false);
            gr.update();
            this.parentUpdated = true;
        }
    },

    type: 'AttachmentAuditTrailHelper'
};]]></script>
